page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN THE SAMPLE SURVEY, THE ADULTS ENGAGED IN EMPLOYMENT IN EXCESS OF 30 HOURS PER WEEK, TOTALLED 145. THEY WERE EMPLOYED IN A WIDE VARIETY OF OCCUPATIONS, 38 DIFFERENT OCCUPATIONS WERE IDENTIFIED. TO SIMPLIFY THE RESULTS, WE GROUPED THEM INTO 3 TYPES: INDUSTRIAL OCCUPATIONS 39% SERVICE OCCUPATIONS 41% FINANCIAL SECTOR 20%. THERE WAS NO OBVIOUS SINGLE EMPLOYER OR OCCUPATION. THE LOCATIONS OF WORK PLACES WERE DIVERSE. LONDON (CENTRAL & GREATER) SUPPLIED MOST OF THE EMPLOYMENT, 57% BASILDON 16% S.W.F. 13% SOUTHEND 4% CHELMSFORD& BRENTWOOD 5% EACH.
